page.description: If the Dialog has been bound to tables, sets the primary key value for the specified table alias.

argument.name: value
argument.description: The primary key value to set.

argument.name: row
argument.description: The table alias or a row in a repeating section, depends on source data.

section.description: If row is not specified, the alias is a top level alias. Otherwise, row indicates the row in a Repeating Section.

section.title: Example
section.description: The key value is always a Javascript array of character data (even if the primary key is a single column). If value is set to 'undefinedkey' the key is deleted.
section.example: Set the primary key for the INVOICE_ITEMS alias in row 3 of the Repeating Section to '23','11'.; {dialog.Object}.setKey('INVOICE_ITEMS','23','11',3);
